resource_dependency.stockDataAPI: An API endpoint that returns real-time stock data including company details, ticker symbols, market trends, financials, and key ratios.
resource_dependency.reportGenerationAPI: An API endpoint that generates custom stock reports based on user-selected parameters such as format and content sections.
resource_dependency.exportReportAPI: An API endpoint to export generated reports in selected formats (PDF, CSV, etc.).

function: Fetch all stock-related data dynamically from backend APIs to populate the frontend components.
static_description: The main dashboard displays a white background with navy-themed UI components. It includes a header bar with navigation links, a search bar for entering stock codes or names, filters for selecting report formats and content preferences, and placeholders for displaying stock information, market trends, and financial data.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking the 'Search' button triggers an API call to fetch and display relevant stock data.
Pressing Enter while focusing on the stock code/name input field initiates the same search action as clicking the 'Search' button.

resource_dependency.databaseSchema: Set up a PostgreSQL database with tables: stocks(stock_id, symbol, name, sector, industry), reports(report_id, user_selections_json, generated_at), users(user_id, username, email) if needed for tracking purposes.

function: Establish secure connection to a PostgreSQL database using provided environment variables to store and retrieve persistent data related to stocks, reports, and potentially users.
static_description: No visible representation since this is a backend configuration. However, it supports the entire system’s ability to persistently manage stock metadata, historical report generations, and possibly user settings.

resource_dependency.searchInputField: Text input styled with navy border and placeholder text indicating 'Enter stock code or name'

function: Allow users to enter either a stock ticker symbol or full company name to initiate a lookup process.
static_description: A centered horizontal form containing a navy-outlined text input field followed by a navy-filled 'Search' button. Placeholder text inside the input says 'Enter stock code or name'.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking the 'Search' button sends the entered value to the backend for validation and subsequent data fetching.
Pressing Enter within the input field triggers the same behavior as clicking the 'Search' button.

function: Provide controls enabling users to customize their desired output format and choose which sections of the report they want included.
static_description: Below the search area lies two sets of controls: a dropdown menu labeled 'Select Format', pre-populated with common document types, and beneath that, checkboxes grouped under 'Include Sections:', listing options like Basic Info, Market Trends, Financial Data.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking any checkbox toggles selection state; clicking the dropdown reveals available formats.

resource_dependency.generateReportEndpoint: POST /api/reports/generate accepting user selections and returning a downloadable link or embedded preview

function: Process user inputs regarding stock selection, preferred format, and chosen content areas to automatically produce tailored reports.
static_description: Once valid inputs are submitted, a modal appears showing a loading spinner until completion. Upon success, a preview window shows the generated report alongside download/export buttons.

interaction_and_states.description: After selecting preferences, clicking 'Generate Report' triggers the backend service to compile the requested report and return either a direct view or download option.

resource_dependency.companyDetailsSchema: { symbol: string, name: string, sector: string, industry: string }

function: Present fundamental identifying attributes about a selected stock including its ticker symbol, official company name, business sector, and industry classification.
static_description: A card-style panel titled 'Company Overview' presents aligned label-value pairs showing Symbol, Name, Sector, and Industry in navy font against a white background.

resource_dependency.marketTrendVisualizerComponent: Chart.js or similar library rendering line graphs and candlestick patterns

function: Illustrate recent performance movements through graphical representations highlighting upward/downward trends along with supporting numerical metrics.
static_description: Adjacent to the company info card, there's a dedicated chart container labeled 'Market Trends' displaying interactive time-series plots with directional arrows or color-coded indicators denoting positive/negative movement.

interaction_and_states.description: Hovering over data points reveals tooltips showing exact price/volume values at those timestamps.

resource_dependency.financialDataTableSchema: { earnings: number, revenue: number, pe_ratio: float, debt_to_equity: float }

function: Tabulate critical fiscal statistics essential for evaluating a company’s financial health and investment potential.
static_description: Another collapsible table titled 'Financial Highlights' lists key figures such as Earnings Per Share, Revenue, P/E Ratio, Debt-to-Equity ratio arranged neatly in rows and columns.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking the expand/collapse icon toggles visibility of detailed financial entries without reloading the page.

function: Apply consistent styling throughout the application using predefined CSS variables ensuring uniformity in background and component colors.
static_description: Entire layout uses solid white (#FFFFFF) for backgrounds and deep navy blue (#000080) consistently applied to buttons, headers, borders, and active elements across pages.

resource_dependency.responsiveBreakpoints: @media queries targeting standard device widths: mobile (<768px), tablet (768px–1024px), desktop (>1024px)

function: Ensure optimal viewing experience regardless of screen size by adapting layouts fluidly between breakpoints.
static_description: All major UI sections stack vertically on smaller screens but reflow horizontally when sufficient space allows. Font sizes adjust accordingly, and touch targets increase proportionally on mobile views.

resource_dependency.realTimeWebSocketAPI: Websocket endpoint providing live updates on stock prices and changes without manual refresh

function: Continuously poll or receive push notifications from backend systems to keep displayed data synchronized with latest market conditions.
static_description: Live status badge near top right corner indicates connection state ('Connected'/'Disconnected') and flashes briefly whenever fresh data arrives.

interaction_and_states.description: Hovering over the live indicator provides additional context like last updated timestamp.

resource_dependency.errorMessages: { invalidSymbol: 'Invalid stock code entered.', noDataAvailable: 'No data found for this stock.' }

function: Gracefully handle cases where user submits incorrect or unsupported stock identifiers or when source data becomes temporarily inaccessible.
static_description: Upon encountering errors, clear alert banners appear above respective forms or panels explaining what went wrong and how users might correct it.

function: Offer multiple avenues for saving or sharing completed reports beyond browser-based viewing.
static_description: Within the report results section, secondary action buttons labeled 'Download PDF', 'Export as CSV', etc., are visually distinct yet maintain theme consistency.

interaction_and_states.description: Each button initiates a separate API request to generate and deliver the equivalent version of the current report.

function: Indicate ongoing processing during intensive operations such as report generation or large dataset retrieval.
static_description: Overlay semi-transparent darkened mask covers main interface during loading phases accompanied by centrally positioned animated spinner graphic sourced from local assets folder.

resource_dependency.authTokenHeader: Authorization Bearer token passed via HTTP headers for verifying requests originate from authenticated sessions

function: Protect sensitive endpoints from unauthorized access by enforcing token-based authentication protocols.
static_description: No explicit UI element shown but underlying network traffic appends appropriate authorization headers before transmitting sensitive requests.
